text: The Incredible Melting Man is a 1977 American science fiction horror movie directed by William Sachs and starring Alex Rebar, Burr DeBenning, Myron Healey, Jonathan Demme, Lisle Wilson and Janus Blythe. It was distributed by American International Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 horror movies Category:1977 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s monster movies Category:American monster movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:American independent movies
title: The Incredible Melting Man
